items.name: swipe-row
items.title: Swipe Row
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A swipe row for providing actions of swipe of left and right

items.name: discussion
items.title: Discussion
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A component for displaying nested discussions or comment threads.

items.name: spinning-circle
items.title: Spinning Circle
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A customizable spinning circle loader component for indicating loading states in your application. Features smooth animations and optional loading messages.

items.name: morphing-square
items.title: Morphing Square
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A customizable morphing square loader component for indicating loading states in your application. Features smooth shape transitions and optional loading messages.

items.name: orbital-loader
items.title: Orbital Loader
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A customizable orbital loader component for indicating loading states in your application. Features smooth orbital animations and optional loading messages.

items.name: typewriter-loader
items.title: Typewriter Loader
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A customizable typewriter loader component for indicating loading states in your application. Features smooth typing animations and customizable text content.

items.name: profile-menu
items.title: Profile Menu
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: An animated collapsible profile menu component with smooth transitions and customizable content sections.

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: An animated checkbox component with smooth transitions and hover effects built on Radix UI primitives.

items.name: bouncing-dots
items.title: Bouncing Dots
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: An animated loading indicator featuring three bouncing dots with customizable colors and spacing.

items.name: wave-loader
items.title: Wave Loader
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: An animated loading indicator featuring vertical bars that scale up and down in a wave-like pattern to indicate loading states.

items.name: voice-input
items.title: Voice Input
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: An interactive voice recording interface with animated visual feedback, timer display, and customizable start/stop callbacks.

items.name: expandable-button
items.title: Expandable Button
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A button that smoothly transitions between collapsed and expanded states using spring animations. Shows only an icon when collapsed and reveals text alongside the icon when expanded, perfect for responsive layouts and space-saving interfaces.

items.name: liquid-glass-button
items.title: Liquid Glass Button
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A glassmorphic button component with backdrop blur effects and liquid-like visual styling for modern interfaces.

items.name: warp-dialog
items.title: Warp Dialog
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A visually striking dialog component with 3D warp animations and smooth transitions. Features perspective transformations, animated backgrounds, and spring-based motion effects for an immersive user experience.

items.name: word-rotate
items.title: Word Rotate
items.author: Rushil Dhinoja
items.description: A text animation component that smoothly rotates through an array of words with customizable duration and motion effects.
